title: Understanding Encryption
text: Encryption is a method used to secure data by transforming it into a format that is unreadable without a decryption key.

title: Why Encrypt Data?
text: The main goal of encryption is to ensure that only authorized parties can access the original data.

hintAnswer: protect data by converting it into a secure format
title: Purpose of Encryption
text: What is the primary purpose of encryption?
choices: protect data by converting it into a secure format
